titleInfo.title: Dear Mother I've come home to die

subject.topic: Debate over slavery, the Secession Crisis, and the Civil War: Tennessee as a uniquely divided border state .

mods.note: This sad song tells of an American Civil War soldier coming home to die with his family. It is included in a bound volume of music that belonged to Miss Nora Gardner, a Tennessee resident. "Nora Lee Gardner from her friend A.B.W." is inscribed in pencil on the top of the cover page.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Created and edited in general conformance to MODS Guidelines (Version 3.5).
